attributes.action: MP's Attendance During Debates in Houses of Parliament to be Recorded
attributes.additional_details:
After watching BBC Parliament on 27th Feb I was shocked to see the severe lack of MPs in attendance for the Welfare Reforms Debate.

I therefore would like attendance records published showing all MP's attendance percentages and which specific debates they have attended to be made available to all the UK public.

If these are not recorded, which I believe they are, then I want all future MP's attendance and the specific debates attended to be recorded and records to be made available to all the UK public.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the House and not for HM Government
